name: heavy-metal-playlist
description: Setlist manager for heavy metal bands

scripts.electron:serve: concurrently "ng serve --host 0.0.0.0" "wait-on http://localhost:4200 && npm run electron:compile && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: ng build --base-href ./ && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder
scripts.electron:build:mac: ng build --base-href ./ && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --mac
scripts.electron:build:win: ng build --base-href ./ && npm run electron:compile && electron-builder --win
